message: @ericflo, @alex, we need another dose of the DjangoDose

+1 to that! It's not just a selfish interest either. I think a rollicking podcast is part of the health of any tech community. It keeps things alive, keeps the juices flowing, etc. If you guys can't swing the time, please try and hand it off!

I enjoyed django-dose I used them a lot when I was learning django to learn what was possible and what was coming. I do miss it. But I also certainly understand not having enough time to do everything that you want to do too!
@alex and I discussed this recently, stay tuned
